insurancemodel

Class Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.Policy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildingPolicy, CarPolicy, ContentPolicy, LifePolicy

    public abstract class Policy
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class containing two fields, policyNo and policyYear. This class assigns policyNo's and years to all policies, allowing for easy management of the insurance policies the company controls.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String policyNo 
      protected int policyYear 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Policy(java.lang.String newPolicyNo, int newPolicyYear)
      Constructor for Policy objects, that also checks and catches an policies with illegal policy numbers or years of issue.

      • policyYear

    • Constructor Detail

      • Policy

        public Policy(java.lang.String newPolicyNo,
              int newPolicyYear)
       throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructor for Policy objects, that also checks and catches an policies with illegal policy numbers or years of issue.
        Parameters:
        newPolicyNo - the policy number for this given policy
        newPolicyYear - the year of issue for this given policy
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - catches any policies that have illegal policy numbers or have years of issue outside the boundaries of the project. This will return an error message when triggered.

        Accessor method to return the value of a particular policyYear
        Returns:
        the policy year of this Policy object as an integer
